doc.title: The Flintstones
doc.plot: Fred awakes one morning to discover that Wilma's necklace was missing and so was the salt shaker, so Fred hurries off to Leaf Rock where he dodges cliffs, waterfalls, and prehistoric monsters to retrieve the necklace. Then Barney's fishing hook is missing so Fred heads underwater, doding lava flows and piranhas and get it back. Next Fred heads across the vast desert in the Flintmobile in search of missing Pebbles. Then Betty says she lost her hair ribbon on a train in Boulder City, followed by Bamm-Bamm's club being stolen by a mean dragon, and finally, Fred chases an egg to Hard Rock where he pits himself against fast mine carts, neanderthals and Wizard Rock, the notorious zapping wizard.
